title: Garbage collection optional for C# UWP apps
body: I wish that garbage collection was optional for C# UWP apps.  Our users occasionally experience freezes in our current high data volume C# .Net app that I believe is because of garbage collection.  Having to move to C++ for this would mean a drop in productivity for our developers.

comments.body: Mike, can you go into more detail? A GC is part of a managed language. Have you tried doing any heap analysis to verify what is going to what generation level? https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms973837.aspx has helpful tips on optimization.
